channel.title: Java/JDK
channel.description: I just recently reinstalled my Windows XP computer, and when I did, Java was uninstalled and so was JDK. I just reinstalled both of them, and JDK is acting up. I fixed all of my JDK paths in my Compilers, but they say the path can't be found, some just say "Press any key to Continue...". I think it has something to do with my Environmental Variables, if anyone has the Variables I can put in just let me know. Any help is appreciated.

item.title: Java/JDK
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

I just recently reinstalled my Windows XP computer, and when I did, Java was uninstalled and so was JDK.
I just reinstalled both of them, and JDK is acting up.
I fixed all of my JDK paths in my Compilers, but they say the path can’t be found, some just say “Press any key to Continue…”.
I think it has something to do with my Environmental Variables, if anyone has the Variables I can put in just let me know.
Any help is appreciated.

Read full topic
